topic.title: Switchtec Startup Sequencing

body.p: Switchtec requires the following startup timings to be met as provided in #trident_hw_reset_init/RSTB_Timing_lgrzihzem.

entry.p: Power valid to Host PERST# release
(Internal switch behaviour) Host PERST# release to LTSSM detect ready
(Internal switch behaviour) Host PERST# release to enumeration (Switch will provide CRS to host when requests are made)
RSTB release to switch LTSSM ready for link training
LTSSM Ready to switch ready for enumeration
(Internal switch behaviour) Host PERST# release to enumeration (Switch will provide CRS to host when requests are made)
RSTB release to switch LTSSM ready for link training
LTSSM Ready to switch ready for enumeration
(Internal switch behaviour) Host PERST# release to enumeration (Switch will provide CRS to host when requests are made)

note.p: Due to boot time requirements, it is not permitted to connect device RSTB to host PERSTB/PERST#
When ECC mode of FLASH is enabled, the boot time is extended as access to flash is slower than NON ECC mode.
